so far, a regular Bulgarian variation in the Sicilian: against some form of a Grand Prix Attack; but White takes a wrong turn...
moves.11. exd6 e.p. Qxd6 12. Be4 Ra7 13. Be3 N: exposing the weakness of White: Black is just a move away from finishing development...
moves.15. Bxb7 Rxb7 16. Ne4 Qb4+ 17. Qd2 Qxd2+: White prefers this, over losing d4: that will cost him...
the move of a madman: White is seriously considering a mate attempt...
